Text: 128kbs is a totally subpar bit rate for music. What you need to do is find a minimum of 192kbs, preferably 320 cbr. Until then, please keep your garbage to yourself. Thank You.

Hey asshole [theserialchiller]. Keep your crappy thoughts to yourself. If you don't want it, take a hike. Not everyone thinks like you.

I have tons of 128 bit songs that sound btter than most people's 320 bit. It's all in your encoder and the whole piont of having them at the smaller bitrate is to fit more on yout harddrive or MP3 player. Why stop at 320 bit, why not just use the raw wave files?
